_xResult.title: Be a Diva Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made grey dress with nude insert
_xResult.longdesc:
The golden years of American cinema may be over, but a Hollywood glam dress is never forgotten. Inspired by those years long ago, this pure silk midi dress will hug your unique silhouette and feel like a million bucks on your skin. The bell sleeves are distinctive, making for a stylish outfit with a diaphanous air for private parties or formal evening events. Dress up with diamonds and sparkles for a stunning effect, or make it more casual with silver mod accessories.


You need an evening gown made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
